description:
We will show how to handle different types of unstructured data and with help with R we will give you the tools that allow to structure, aggregate, transform and perform basic analysis of your data. The aims of this meetup is to turn you into a Data Wrangler! 
What you should bring:
Water bottle, pen, paper, computer. 
Install the following softwares:
– R: https://cran.r-project.org/
– RStudio: https://www.rstudio.com/products/rstudio/download/
name: Disruptive Data Science
